</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[Eden Editor: Connecting|Connect]] entities together. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''add3DENConnection''' [type, from, to] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - connection class from ''Cfg3DEN >> Connections'' </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> from: [[Array]] of [[Eden Entity|Eden Entities]] - entities which are being connected </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> to: [[Eden Entity]]- entity to which entities will be connected to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the connection was made </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[add3DENConnection]] ["RandomStart",[[get3DENSelected]] "Object","marker_0"]</code>
Set random start on marker "marker_0" for all selected objects.
</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
